original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavato avidūre nisinno hoti pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya kāyagatāya satiyā ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitāya.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ bhagavataḥ avidūre nisinnaḥ hoti pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya kāya gatāya satiyā ajjhattam su upaṭṭhitāya

original: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ avidūre nisinnaṁ pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya kāyagatāya satiyā ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitāya.
analyzed: addasā khalu bhagavā āyasmantam mahāmoggallānam avidūre nisinnam pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya kāya gatāya satiyā ajjhattam su upaṭṭhitāya

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi
